dcterms:description: GridWorld is a grid structured environment with a size of 9 Ã— 9, composed of ground, pit tiles, and a goal. The agent navigates to the goal tile with available actions and faces exploration challenges due to random movements and tight time limits.
dcterms:title: GridWorld

dcterms:creator: K. Young
T. Tian
dcterms:description: MinAtar is an environment composed of minimal versions of five popular Atari games, designed to reduce representational complexity while maintaining core game mechanics. Each game has a common action space and binary tensor observations.
dcterms:title: MinAtar
